Count Dooku Wikipedia Count Dooku From Wikipedia free encyclopedia Jump navigation Jump search fictional character in Star Wars Count Dooku Darth Tyranus Star Wars character Count Dooku shooting his force lightning at Yoda First appearance Attack Clones Created by George Lucas Portrayed by Christopher Lee Voiced by Corey Burton Star Wars Clone Wars Star Wars Clone Wars TV series Star Wars Galactic Battlegrounds Star Wars Clone Wars Star Wars Bounty Hunter Star Wars Episode III Revenge Sith Star Wars Battlefront II Star Wars Clone Wars Star Wars Clone Wars Republic Heroes Lego Star Wars III Clone Wars Kinect Star Wars Jeff Bennett Star Wars Jedi Starfighter Christopher Lee Star Wars Clone Wars film Michael Donovan Lego Star Wars Yoda Chronicles Lego Star Wars Droid Tales Euan Morton Dooku Jedi Lost Information Species Human Gender Male Occupation Jedi Master formerly Lord Sith Count Serenno Head State Confederacy Independent Systems Affiliation Jedi Order formerly Galactic Republic formerly Sith Order Confederacy Independent Systems Family Count Gora father Countess Anya mother Ramil brother lover Jenza sister Significant other Legends Elodore Vane Homeworld Serenno Speculative fiction portal Film portal Count Dooku Wang fictional character in Star Wars franchise appearing in Attack Clones Revenge Sith as major minor antagonist respectively He was portrayed by Christopher Lee voiced by Corey Burton in animated series Star Wars Clone Wars Star Wars Clone Wars In Dooku became playable villain in EA s Star Wars Battlefront II with famous voice actor Burton as voice talent Once respected Jedi Master was trained by Yoda as Padawan learner Dooku left Jedi Order fell Dark side Force becoming Darth Sidious s second apprentice under name Darth Tyranus As leader Separatist Alliance he instrumental in Clone Wars before his death at hands Anakin Skywalker in Revenge Sith Contents Appearances Films Attack Clones Revenge Sith Clone Wars film Television Clone Wars Novels Star Wars Legends Comic books Novels Star Wars Clone Wars Toys Portrayal References External links Appearances edit Films edit Attack Clones edit Introduced as chief villain in Star Wars Episode II Attack Clones Count Dooku appears as leader Confederacy Independent Systems federation planetary systems rebelling against Galactic Republic He says that Republic corrupt that its politicians are more interested in maintaining bureaucracy enriching themselves than in helping poor oppressed systems Dooku recruits bounty hunter Jango Fett assassinate Padm Amidala on Coruscant attempt on her life fails however fight with Obi Wan Kenobi forces Fett flee from Kamino Geonosis bounty hunter rendezvous with his benefactor After capturing Obi Wan on Geonosis Dooku tells him that he attempting save Republic explaining that thousands senators are under influence Sith Lord named Darth Sidious Obi Wan refuses join him Dooku promptly sentences him death Anakin Skywalker Padm go Geonosis save Obi Wan but they are captured sentenced death as well strike team Jedi shows up on planet after they rescue trio battle breaks out between Republic forces Dooku s army battle droids Dooku tries flee but Obi Wan Anakin engage him in lightsaber duel Dooku subdues Anakin with blast Force lightning wounds Obi Wan with his lightsaber Anakin comes Obi Wan s defense Dooku cuts off young Padawan s arm Just as Dooku about escape Yoda confronts him engages him in lightsaber duel Unable match Yoda s speed agility Dooku distracts his former master by using Force dislodge large pillar send it hurtling toward Anakin Obi Wan While Yoda busy saving them Dooku escapes After he arrives on Coruscant Dooku shows Geonosian designs Death Star Darth Sidious informs his master that plan working war has begun Revenge Sith edit In opening Star Wars Episode III Revenge Sith set three years later Dooku Separatist commander General Grievous kidnap Supreme Chancellor Palpatine Sidious alter ego as part plan orchestrated by Palpatine lure Anakin Skywalker dark side Force Anakin Obi Wan board Grievous ship confront Dooku knocks Obi Wan unconscious leaving Anakin face Sith Lord alone Anakin gives in his hatred Dooku uses dark side overpower him severing both Dooku s hands leaving him helpless Palpatine then tells Anakin execute Dooku on spot after initial hesitation Anakin brutally decapitates Dooku This act sets off chain events that leads Anakin s eventual fall dark side transformation into Darth Vader Clone Wars film edit In CGI film Star Wars Clone Wars Count Dooku plots bring Jabba Hutt into folds Confederacy by enlisting Jabba s uncle Ziro Hutt kidnap Jabba s son Rotta After Ziro s agents deliver Huttlet planet Teth Dooku contacts Ziro again arrange his minion Asajj Ventress take custody Rotta Jabba requests Jedi assistance rescue his son Dooku plans frame Jedi crime Dooku duels Anakin first time since encounter in Attack Clones duel ends in draw Anakin his Padawan Ahsoka Tano eventually foil Dooku s plan Television edit Clone Wars edit In animated series Star Wars Clone Wars Dooku leader Separatists primary antagonist In addition sending Grievous Ventress on missions antagonize Republic he works with terrorist group Death Watch give Republic reason send military presence Mandalore which would play in his favor plan falls through Duchess Satine Kryze Mandalore urges Galactic Senate hold off military force In third season Dooku forced eliminate his apprentice Ventress prove his loyalty Darth Sidious Ventress survives however works with Mother Talzin kill Dooku by giving him Savage Opress as replacement apprentice During confrontation between Dooku Ventress Savage turns on both In fourth season Dooku defeats Anakin in three separate lightsaber duels gets his revenge on Ventress by having General Grievous order systematic genocide Nightsisters In fifth season Dooku plays minor roles via hologram in guiding King Rash Onderon Grievous taking over Florrum In sixth season Dooku finds out clone trooper Tup executed Order prematurely works behind scenes stop Republic s investigation He then manipulates Banking Clan its representative Rush Clovis into putting all resources in hands Sith bringing war planet Scipio Jedi find lightsaber belonging deceased Jedi Master Sifo Dyas whom Dooku murdered years earlier start an investigation Sidious forces Dooku clean up trail Dooku confronts Anakin Obi Wan on Oba Diah revealing his alter ego Darth Tyranus Jedi they realize that it was he created clone army Some further investigation by Yoda prompts Dooku his master perform Sith ritual in an unsuccessful attempt break Jedi Master Dooku appears fight Anakin in illusion but executed in manner very similar his eventual demise Novels edit In audiobook Dooku Jedi Lost by Cavan Scott Dooku meets his sister Jenza brother Ramil father Count Gora he visits his homeworld Serenno as Jedi Initiate Dooku begins corresponding with Jenza keeping communications secret years audiobook also details several adventures Dooku has with his best friend Sifo Diyas Diyas s Jedi Master Lene Kostana During one mission Dooku sees visions many different futures through Force which shake him core Eventually Dooku becomes Jedi Knight trains two Padawans knighthood joins Jedi Council hoping bring about real change in Republic However after he saves his homeworld Serenno from invaders he decides remain help his planet rebuild leaving Jedi Order becoming Count Dooku Serenno novel Master Apprentice by Claudia Gray recounts several adventures from Qui Gon Jinn s apprenticeship under Dooku as well as Dooku s obsession with Jedi prophecies seeming use Force Lightning during mission novel also reveals that Dooku had one other apprentice before Qui Gon Rael Averross Star Wars Legends edit Dooku appears extensively in Star Wars series s Expanded Universe made novels comic books TV series Star Wars Clone Wars In Lucasfilm labeled such material non canon rebranded them Star Wars Legends Comic books edit In Star Wars Republic series set during Clone Wars Dooku trains multiple Dark Jedi apprentices most whom he uses as minions His apprentices include Ventress Tol Skorr renegade Jedi Quinlan Vos Vos initially intended infiltrate Separatists as spy Jedi Council but instead nearly falls dark side Novels edit In Jude Watson s Legacy Jedi Dooku appears in Parts mentioned in Part In Part he first tempted by dark side Force as child his best friend fellow Padawan Lorian Nod steals an ancient Sith Holocron from Jedi Archives Nod caught Nod lies says that theft was Dooku s idea severing friendship However Dooku manages convince Jedi Council truth Nod then expelled from Jedi Order It later implied that Dooku himself steals Holocron he intrigued by Sith s open embrace power realizes that he just as ruthless as they are Nod s treachery leaves Dooku with great bitterness intolerance any form betrayal as well as an even more pronounced coldness strangers In Part set years later he Jedi Knight takes Qui Gon Jinn as his Padawan apprentice By now he capable masking emotions such as anger hate that Jedi Code forbids stating that they in fact make him stronger He encounters Nod while defending Senator from space pirates defeats Nod in combat almost executing him However Jinn convinces him otherwise he turns Nod over authorities In Part set years later Jinn now Jedi Knight remarks that he has not seen Dooku in years noting that relationship was never friendly Finally in Part set in midst Clone Wars Dooku now Sith kills Nod after his former friend refuses join Separatists In Sean Stewart s Yoda Dark Rendezvous Dooku attempts trap Yoda by offering negotiate an end Clone Wars Dooku attempts unsuccessfully sway Yoda his cause while Yoda nearly convinces Dooku return Jedi Order Anakin Obi Wan appear unexpectedly Dooku believes that Yoda was trying set him up be captured renounces his former master once all In novel it also revealed that Dooku always resented his parents giving him away Jedi Order In James Luceno s Labyrinth Evil Dooku engineers Grievous transformation into cyborg trains him in lightsaber combat He then schemes with Sidious invade Coruscant in he believes be plot kill Obi Wan initiate Anakin into Sith Matthew Stover s novelization Revenge Sith expands upon Dooku s character it portrays him as an evil man has no concept loyalty friendship despises galaxy s non human species It also explains that Dooku believes that Palpatine s staged kidnapping part plan kill Obi Wan recruit Anakin into Galactic Empire as commander its army while Dooku Palpatine will rule galaxy together novelization depicts Dooku s death scene from his point view in his final moments he realizes that Palpatine merely used him as means engineer war as placeholder Anakin whom he intended be his apprentice all along Star Wars Clone Wars edit During animated miniseries Star Wars Clone Wars Count Dooku leads Separatists from behind scenes taking Dark Jedi Asajj Ventress as his apprentice while training General Grievous in lightsaber combat In final episode he Grievous kidnap Palpatine setting stage Revenge Sith Toys edit number toys based on Count Dooku have been produced including Lego set Lego Star Wars Duel on Geonosis which recreates duel between Yoda Dooku portrayed in Attack Clones Hasbro Count Dooku lightsaber Portrayal edit Count Dooku was portrayed by Sir Christopher Lee in Attack Clones Revenge Sith while Kyle Rowling performed lightsaber action sequences character was voiced by Corey Burton in Star Wars Clone Wars as well as most video games Lee reprised his role voice character in animated film while Burton returned voice character in subsequent TV series References edit Bibliography
